Package civitas.celestis.graphics.face

Class ColoredFace

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.util.alphabetical.AlphabeticalTuple<Vertex>
civitas.celestis.graphics.face.ColoredFace
All Implemented Interfaces:
Face, AlphabeticalGroup<Vertex>, Serializable
public class ColoredFace extends AlphabeticalTuple<Vertex> implements Face
A face with a single color component.
